snippet.title: Amber Heard claims Depp said she 'would get raped' because of sexy dresses
snippet.description: Amber Heard was at London's High Court today as she testified in ex Johnny Depp's libel trial.  The trial has now entered its third week as the actor sues NGN for an article that appeared in The Sun in 2018 which called him a "wife beater", a claim he strenuously denied.  Lawyers for NGN are defending their case based on Heard's 14 allegations of abuse, which include claims of bust-ups between 2013 and 2016.  In court today, Amber claimed Johnny, 57, would "obsess" about how she dressed and called her a "wh**e" and a sl*t."  Read More Related Articles  Read More Related Articles   She said: "He would obsess about how I dressed. If I wore a low-cut dress, then he would say things like “my girl is not gonna dress like a wh**e.  "Over time, I stopped wearing revealing dresses for red carpet events: it just wasn’t worth the verbal and psychological abuse."  She added: "He demeaned me anytime I tried to wear anything that could be seen as sexy, calling me a “wh**e”, “sl*t”, “fame-hungry” and “an attention wh**e”, but it got worse over time.  Read More Related Articles  Read More Related Articles   "He started saying things like 'Well I’m going to have to watch you get raped' and "I hope you get railed by a bunch of f**king fellas.”  "Sometimes he used racial epithets about the men I would be – or deserved to be – assaulted by, saying things like “a slimy Mexican” or “a f**king gang of big black mother f**kers are going to f**k you and get their big c**k in you”."  Amber continued: "His verbal abuse was often sexualised, but it was also about my looks and related to my work, saying things like 'No one will hire you when your t*ts and a** sag” or calling me “fat a**”.   "Sometimes I would react and give it back to him, calling him “old man” or “limp d**k”.  "He would often refer to my verbal insults as “right hooks” or “sucker-punches”. For the most part, it wasn’t worth responding because it only antagonised him."  Amber also said that Johnny accused her of having affairs with her film co-stars today including Channing Tatum, Eddie Redmayne and James Franco.   She added: "He also accused me of having affairs with stars I auditioned with, like Leonardo DiCaprio."  The actress also claims Depp threatened to kill her "many times".
